meaning: religion, sect, denomination, main point, origin, essence

onyomiExamples.meaning: sect, denomination, tenets (of a religious sect)
religion, religious affiliation, belief, faith, creed, religious activity
Jōdo Shinshū (offshoot of the Jōdo sect), True Pure Land School

kunyomiExamples.meaning: principle, aim, main purpose, central part, pillar, purport, gist, drift, meaning, instructions, orders, intention, wishes
famous sword, sword blade by Masamune, sake, Japanese rice wine, brand of sake from Nada region during Tenpō era (1830-1844)
